statements: SELECT * FROM StudentAttendance WHERE student_id = 1

SELECT student_id, date, attendance_status FROM StudentAttendance ORDER BY date DESC

SELECT student_name, class_name, attendance_date FROM students INNER JOIN attendance_records ON students.student_id = attendance_records.student_id;
SELECT class_name, COUNT(*) as total_attendance FROM classes INNER JOIN attendance_records ON classes.class_id = attendance_records.class_id GROUP BY class_name;

SELECT student_name, AVG(participation_grade) as avg_grade FROM students INNER JOIN participation_records ON students.student_id = participation_records.student_id GROUP BY student_name HAVING AVG(participation_grade) > 80;
